positions.title: Account Manager, Automotive
positions.overview: The Account Manager, Automotive will oversee sales operations for our automotive sector in California. This role requires extensive knowledge of the automotive industry and strong client management skills.
positions.responsibilities:
• Manage client accounts and relationships.
  • Develop and implement sales strategies.
  • Report directly to senior management.

positions.title: Product Algorithm Engineer
positions.overview: The Principle Product Algorithm Engineer will design, develop, and optimize algorithms for our cutting-edge products. You will work closely with the R&D team to ensure our products stay ahead of the competition.
positions.responsibilities:
• Develop and optimize product algorithms.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams.
  • Stay updated with the latest in algorithm research.

positions.title: Senior Sales Manager
positions.overview: The Senior Sales Manager will lead our sales team, driving revenue growth and managing key accounts across the USA. This role is perfect for a sales professional with a track record of success.
positions.responsibilities:
• Lead the sales team to achieve targets.
  • Manage key accounts and relationships.
  • Develop strategies to increase market share.

positions.title: Technical Support Engineer
positions.overview: The Technical Support Engineer will provide technical assistance to our clients, ensuring that they have the best possible experience with our products. You will be the first point of contact for technical issues.
positions.responsibilities:
• Provide technical support to clients.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues.
  • Document and report recurring issues to the engineering team.

positions.title: Algorithm Engineer
positions.overview: The Algorithm Engineer will work closely with the R&D team to develop and refine algorithms that power our advanced technology products.
positions.responsibilities:
• Design and implement algorithms.
  • Test and refine algorithms for performance.
  • Collaborate with the product team to integrate algorithms into products.

positions.title: Field Service Engineer
positions.overview: The Field Service Engineer will be responsible for installing, maintaining, and troubleshooting our products in the field across Europe.
positions.responsibilities:
• Install and configure products on-site.
  • Provide technical support and maintenance services.
  • Travel extensively across Europe to support client needs.

positions.title: Data Acquisition Technician
positions.overview: The Data Acquisition Technician will be responsible for collecting and processing data used to improve our products. You will work with various teams to ensure data accuracy and integrity.
positions.responsibilities:
• Collect and process data from various sources.
  • Ensure data accuracy and integrity.
  • Work with the R&D team to improve data acquisition methods.

positions.title: Marketing Manager
positions.overview: The Marketing Manager will lead our marketing efforts, developing and executing strategies to promote our products and services in the market.
positions.responsibilities:
• Develop and execute marketing strategies.
  • Lead the marketing team to achieve goals.
  • Analyze market trends and adjust strategies accordingly.

positions.title: Operations Manager
positions.overview: The Operations Manager will oversee daily operations to ensure efficiency and effectiveness. You will work closely with various departments to optimize workflows and processes.
positions.responsibilities:
• Manage day-to-day operations.
  • Optimize workflows and processes.
  • Collaborate with other departments to ensure smooth operations.

positions.title: Hardware Engineer
positions.overview: The Hardware Engineer will design, develop, and test hardware components used in our products. You will work remotely but collaborate closely with the R&D team.
positions.responsibilities:
• Design and develop hardware components.
  • Test hardware for reliability and performance.
  • Collaborate with the R&D team to integrate hardware with software.

positions.title: General Counsel
positions.overview: The General Counsel will be responsible for overseeing all legal matters within the company. This includes advising on corporate governance, regulatory compliance, and intellectual property issues.
positions.responsibilities:
• Advise on corporate governance and compliance.
  • Oversee intellectual property management.
  • Manage all legal aspects of the company.

positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
positions.overview: The Senior Software Engineer will lead software development projects and mentor junior engineers. You will be responsible for designing and implementing software solutions that meet our clients' needs.
positions.responsibilities:
• Lead software development projects.
  • Mentor junior engineers.
  • Design and implement software solutions.

positions.title: Finance Manager
positions.overview: The Finance Manager will oversee the financial operations of the company, including budgeting, forecasting, and financial reporting.
positions.responsibilities:
• Manage the company's financial operations.
  • Prepare budgets and forecasts.
  • Ensure compliance with financial regulations.

positions.title: Human Resources Manager
positions.overview: The Human Resources Manager will manage all HR-related activities within the company, including recruitment, employee relations, and compliance with labor laws.
positions.responsibilities:
• Oversee recruitment and hiring processes.
  • Manage employee relations and performance evaluations.
  • Ensure compliance with labor laws and regulations.

positions.title: IT Support Specialist
positions.overview: The IT Support Specialist will provide technical support to employees and maintain the company's IT infrastructure.
positions.responsibilities:
• Provide technical support to employees.
  • Maintain and troubleshoot IT systems and networks.
  • Ensure the security of IT systems.
